description:
TG1 Right side SYCAMORE Reduce 1 group of Sycamore tree by 30%	
 T2 Right side PEAR	Reduce 1 Pear tree by 40% (Tree is rotten at base)	
 T3 Right side OAK Reduce limbs over building by 30% & dead wood	
 TG4 Rear right SYCAMORE Lift 1 group of Sycamore trees  to 3m	
 T4a Rear right SYCAMORE To Reduce 1 Sycamore tree over Garage by 25%	
 T5 Rear ELDER Remove 1 Elder tree to ground level	
 TG6 Rear left VARIOUS Reduce various trees by 20% & tidy	
 TG7 Left side CONIFER Lift 3 Conifer trees by 2.5m	
 T8 Left side BEECH	Reduce 1 Beech Hedge by approximately 2 feet 	
 T9 Left side OAK Lift 1 Oak tree by 2m	
 T10 Rear of house	HAWTHORN Fell 1 Hawthorn tree to ground level	
 T11 Front left HAWTHORN Remove 1 Hawthorn tree to ground level	
 T12 Front left ACER	 Remove 1 Acer tree to ground level	
 T13 Rear of house ELDER Remove 1 Elder tree to ground level & grind stump	
 T14 Left front HAWTHORN Reduce 1 Hawthorn tree by 20%	
 T15 Left front ELDER Reduce 1 Elder tree by 20%	
 TG16 Front SYCAMORE Reduce 1 row of Sycamore trees by 20-25% 	
 TG17 Front ACER Thin 1 Acer copse of 4 stems	
 T18 Front	CHESTNUT Reduce 1 Chestnut tree by 30%	
 T19 Front	OAK Dead wood 1 Oak tree	
 T20 Front	OAK Dead wood 1 Oak tree	
 TG21 Front HAWTHORN Thin 2 Hawthorn trees to vertical leaders
